attributes.action: Let direct flights to northern Cyprus (turkish republic of northern cyprus)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 4 years ago it was promised to thousends of turkish cypriot people who live in the UK that a lot of embargoes will be lifted that is against turkish cypriots. after 4 years there has been no improvements at all! we were promised to have direct flights to north cyprus but that promise was not kept! im a 16 year old boy whi flys to north cyprus every summer and new years but i have to stop at Turkey just to be able to go to my own country! i think it is time to end this discrimination against turkish cypriots because i think every turkish cypriot have been very patient with all the promises kept but i think its time to change things because there is NO law that Ercan int airport cannot have direct flights!

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
